alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Brown; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 28 at 2:21PM CST until January 28 at 6:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches. Highest amounts across Keya Paha, Boyd and Holt County. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected tonight through Sunday morning. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Keya Paha, Boyd, Brown, Rock and Holt Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to noon CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.

area.areaDesc: Boyd; Brown; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock
